articles.title: Virginia teacher shot by six-year-old files $40m lawsuit - BBC
articles.description: The lawsuit argues that the defendants knew the six-year-old "had a history of random violence".
articles.content:
A Virginia school teacher who was shot by her six-year-old student has filed a $40m (£32m) lawsuit against school officials, alleging gross negligence for ignoring warning signs.

articles.title: World's first testosterone patch for menopausal women in development - The Telegraph
